metadata.dc:author: Navalón Verdejo, P
Sabater Marco, V
Donderis Guastavino, C
Gonzalvo Pérez, V
Blasco Alfonso Enrique, E
Ramada Benlloch, F
Zaragoza Orts, J
metadata.dc:description: Presentation of one case of vesical nephrogenic adenoma diagnosed as an accidental histological finding following TUR of vesical tumour. This case if considered of interest due to the rarity of the lesion (some 300 cases reported) and the limited number of quotations in the Spanish literature.
metadata.dc:title: Adenoma nefrogénico de vejiga.
[Nephrogenic adenoma of the bladder].
